001package violajones_utils;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.util.List;
006
007import ij.IJ;
008import ij.ImagePlus;
009import ij.ImageStack;
010import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
011import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
012import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
013import imagingbook.violajones.DATA.HaarTrainingSet;
014import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureNode;
015import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeaturePatch;
016import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureTree;
017import imagingbook.violajones.lib.HaarCascadeDescriptor;
018import imagingbook.violajones.lib.Stage;
019
020/**
021 * ImageJ plugin. Visualizes the evaluation sequence for the selected Haar cascade.
022 * The current image is scaled to the size of the cascade (typ. 32x32)
023 * and shown in the background. 
024 * The result is an image stack, with one slice for classifier
025 * each decision step.
026 * 
027 * Feature support regions are shown as drawn into the image (to 
028 * allow saving as a video).
029 * 
030 * @author WB
031 *
032 */
033public class Visualize_Haar_Cascade_Paint implements PlugInFilter {
034        
035        static HaarTrainingSet desc = HaarTrainingSet.FrontalFaceAlt2;
036
037        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
038                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
039        }
040
041        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
042        
043                InputStream strm = desc.getStream();
044                if (strm == null) {
045                        IJ.log("could not open training set");
046                        return;
047                }
048                
049                HaarCascadeDescriptor cascade = HaarCascadeDescriptor.fromInputStream(strm);
050                
051                int w = cascade.getWidth();
052                int h = cascade.getHeight();
053                
054                List<Stage> stages = cascade.getStages();
055                
056                // create and populate the stack
057                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(w, h);
058                ImageProcessor sp1 = ip.resize(w, h);
059                
060                int stageCtr = 0;
061                for (Stage stage : stages) {
062                        int treeCtr = 0;
063                        for (FeatureTree tree : stage.getTrees()) {
064                                int featureCtr = 0;
065                                for (FeatureNode feature : tree.getFeatures()) {
066                                        ImageProcessor sp = sp1.duplicate();
067                                        for (FeaturePatch r : feature.getPatches()) {
068                                                Color col = (r.weight > 0) ? Color.green : Color.red;
069                                                sp.setColor(col);
070                                                sp.fillRect(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height);
071                                        }
072                                        stack.addSlice("Stage=" + stageCtr + " Tree=" + treeCtr + " Feat=" + featureCtr, sp);
073                                        featureCtr++;
074                                }
075                                treeCtr++;
076                        }
077                        stageCtr++;
078                }
079                
080                ImagePlus stackim = new ImagePlus("Cascade", stack);
081                stackim.show();
082                GuiTools.zoomExact(stackim, 10);
083                
084        }
085        
086//      private List<Roi> getRectangles(FeatureNode feature) {
087//              List<Roi> rectRois = new ArrayList<Roi>();
088//              for (FeaturePatch r : feature.getPatches()) {
089//                      rectRois.add(new Roi(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height));
090//              }
091//              return rectRois;
092//      }

114}
